resources.string: Unable to read tag. NFC adapter is not reachable
Tag was not recognised. Please, close this message and try again
Tag name is unknown. Try again or skip it
NFC adapter is disabled or does not exist. Please, check settings and try again
GPS adapter is disabled or does not exist. Please, check settings and try again
Wi-Fi / Mobile Internet are disabled or connection is lost. Please, check settings and try again
Application requests access to get location while user scanning tags
Application requests access to get IMEI of the device to use it as unique identifier of user
Unfortunately, permission denied. Application may work not properly
Tag was read successfully, but location is not reachable
